Name: Cave of Awakening
Description: A dark damp cavern with a small pool of murky water.

Name: Chasm of Warpaths
Description: A long ominous tunnel that leads into other tunnels that are marked with emblems.

Name: Armory
Description: A warm cavern that echoes the clanking of anvils.

Name: Marrowbrew Co. Brewing Tent
Description: A dark green and purple-striped tent with two amiable skeletons inside.

Name: The "Proving Pit"
Description: A deep pit where new recruits prove themselves in combat.
